alert.note: Alert for Castro; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of Castro and Swisher Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 746 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Dimmitt to 3 miles north of Happy. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tulia, Dimmitt, Hart, Happy, Summerfield, Easter and Nazareth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds will arrive before any rainfall. Do not delay taking shelter until rain arrives.
